QMusic API Wrapper

Classes¶

class qmusic.Qmusic¶
get_channel(slug='qmusic_be')¶

Gets the channel from the slug.

Parameters

slug (str, optional) – The slug of the channel, defaults to “qmusic_be”

Returns

Returns a Channel object or None if it isn’t available

Return type

Channel

class qmusic.Channel(json)¶
background_image()¶

Gets an url of the background image of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the background image url

Return type

str

color()¶

Gets the colors of the channel

Returns

Returns a Color object

Return type

Color

current_song()¶

Gets the current song playing on the channel.

Returns

Returns a Song object

Return type

Song

logo()¶

Gets the logo url of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the logo url

Return type

str

name()¶

Gets the name of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the name of the channel

Return type

str

next_song()¶

Gets the next song on the channel. The next song might not be available, in that case it returns None.

Returns

Returns a Song object if the next song is available or None if it isn’t available

Return type

Song, bool

search_terms()¶

Gets the slug of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the slug

Return type

str

slug()¶

Gets the slug of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the slug

Return type

str

station_id()¶

Gets the station id of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the station id

Return type

str

streams()¶

Gets the logo url of the channel

Returns

Returns a string with the logo url

Return type

str

class qmusic.Streams(json)¶
aac()¶

A list with Stream objects that contains the source url and extra information

Returns

Returns a list with Stream objects

Return type

list, Stream

android()¶

A list with Mobile objects that contain the high quality url, low quality url and the video url

Returns

Returns an Android object

Return type

Android

hls()¶

A list with Stream objects that contains the source url and extra information

Returns

Returns a list with Stream objects

Return type

list, Stream

iphone()¶

A list with Mobile objects that contain the live url and video url

Returns

Returns an Iphone object

Return type

Iphone

mobile()¶

A list with Mobile objects that contain the audio url, video url and the live url

Returns

Returns a Mobile object

Return type

Mobile

mp3()¶

A list with Stream objects that contains the source url and extra information

Returns

Returns a list with Stream objects

Return type

list, Stream

radioplayer_id()¶

A list with Stream objects that contains the source url and extra information

Returns

Returns a Stream object

Return type

list, Stream

video()¶

A list with Stream objects that contains the source url and extra information

Returns

Returns a list with Stream objects

Return type

list, Stream

class qmusic.Mobile(json)¶
audio()¶

Gets the audio url for mobile

Returns

Returns a string with the audio url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

Gets the live url for mobile

Returns

Returns a string with the live url or None if it isn’t available

str, bool

Returns

Returns a string with the video url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

class qmusic.Color(json)¶
background()¶

Gets a hex string with the background color

Returns

Returns a string with the background color hex

Return type

str

extra()¶

Gets a hex string with an extra color

Returns

Returns a string with an extra color hex or #ffffff if it isn’t available

Return type

str

foreground()¶

Gets a hex string with the foreground color

Returns

Returns a string with the foreground color hex

Return type

str

class qmusic.Song(json, BASE)¶
affiliate_url()¶

Gets the affiliate url of a song

Returns

Return a string with the affiliate url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

artist()¶

Gets the artist of a song

Returns

Return an Artist object

Return type

Artist

featuring_artists()¶

Gets the featuring artists of a song

Returns

Return a list with Artist objects of the featuring artists.

Return type

list, Artist

played_at()¶

Gets the timestamp of when the song started playing

Returns

Return a datetime.datetime object

Return type

datetime.datetime

preview_url()¶

Gets the preview url of a song. IT gives an url with the mp3 file of the first 30 seconds of the song.

Returns

Return a string with the preview url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

release_year()¶

Gets the release year of a song

Returns

Return a string with the release year or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

selector_code()¶

Gets the selector code of a song

Returns

Return a string with the selector code

Return type

str

slug()¶

Gets the slug of the song. E.g. all-i-want-for-christmas-is-you

Returns

Return a string with the slug

Return type

str

spotify_url()¶

Gets the spotify url of a song

Returns

Return a string with the spotify url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

thumbnail_url()¶

Gets the thumbnail url of a song

Returns

Return a string with the thumbnail url

Return type

str

title()¶

Gets the title of the song.

Returns

Return a string with the title

Return type

str

youtube_url()¶

Gets the youtube url of a song

Returns

Return a string with the spotiyoutubefy url or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

class qmusic.Artist(json, BASE)¶
bio()¶

Gets the bio of the artist

Returns

Returns a string with the bio of the artist

Return type

str

country_code()¶

Gets the country code from where the artist is``

Returns

Returns a string with the country code from where the artist is or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

country_name()¶

Gets the country name from where the artist is``

Returns

Returns a string with the country name from where the artist is or None if it isn’t available

Return type

str, bool

id_code()¶

Gets the id/selector_code of the artist

Returns

Returns an int with the id of the artist

Return type

int

name_all_artist()¶

Gets the string with all the names of the song artists. E.g.: ‘LOST FREQUENCIES & MATHIEU KOSS’

Returns

Returns a string with all the song artists names

Return type

str

name_main_artist()¶

Gets the string with the name of the artist. E.g.: ‘LOST FREQUENCIES’

Returns

Returns a string with the song artist name

Return type

str

photo()¶

Gets the photo url of the artist

Returns

Returns a string with the photo url of the artist

Return type

str

slug()¶

Gets the slug of the artist

Returns

Returns a string with the slug of the artist

Return type

str

social_medias()¶

Gets the social medias of the artist

Returns

Returns a dict with the social medias. E.g. {‘facebook_url’: ‘https://www.facebook.com/RolfSanchez’, ‘twitter_url’: ‘https://twitter.com/rolfsanchez’, ‘instagram_url’: ‘https://www.instagram.com/rolfsanchez/’, ‘website’: ‘https://rolf-music.com/’}

Return type

dict

class qmusic.Edition(json)¶

The name of the edition

Returns

Returns a string with the name of the edition

Return type

str

release_year()¶

The release year of the edition

Returns

Returns a string with the release year of the edition

Return type

str

song_position()¶

The position of the song in the edition

Returns

Returns an int with the position of the song in the edition

Return type

int
